tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE chatbot_interactions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    interaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    message TEXT,
    feedback BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE ChatMessage (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message_text TEXT,
    message_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    customer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE InteractionLog (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    message_id INT,
    content_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (message_id) REFERENCES ChatMessage(message_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES MarketingContent(content_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerInteractions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  interaction_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  customer_email VARCHAR(50),
  customer_phone VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE MarketingContent (
  content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  content_type VARCHAR(50),
  content_text TEXT,
  content_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE BotSessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bot_id INT,
  session_start TIMESTAMP,
  session_end TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE BotResponses (
  response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id INT,
  response_text TEXT,
  response_date TIMESTAMP
)
